abilities.name: Ability Type
abilities.description: Fearless Ability TypeBuff Tigreal gains a stack of Fearless each time he uses a skill or is hit by a Basic Attack. After getting 4 stacks, Tigreal will consume all Fearless stacks to block the next incoming Basic Attack (including attacks from Turrets)Attacks from Minions do not grant Fearless stacks nor trigger its effect

abilities.name: Ability Type
abilities.description: Attack Wave Ability TypeAOE Slow DamagePhysical Base Cooldown: 7.0 Base Mana Cost: 45 Tigreal smashes the ground with his hammer and sends a shockwave that erupts 3 time in the target direction, each time deadling 270 (70%Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage to enemies along the fan-shaped area and slowing them by 20%/40%/60% for 1.5s

abilities.name: Ability Type
abilities.description: Sacred Hammer Ability TypeCharge CC DamagePhysical Base Cooldown: 16.0 Base Mana Cost: 70 Tigreal charges in the target direction, dealing (+100%Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage to enemies along the way and pushing them to the end of the chargeUse Again: Tigreal can use this skill again within 4s, dealing 280 (+60%Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage to enemies in front of him and knocking them airborne for 1s.

abilities.name: Ability Type
abilities.description: Implosion Ability TypeCC AOE DamagePhysical Base Cooldown: 55.0 Base Mana Cost: 120 Tigreal unleashes the power of his hammer, pulling nearby enemies to him and stunning them for 1.8s while dealing 270 (+130%Total Physical Attack) Physical DamageThe first half of the channeling can be interrupted by control effects. The second half of the channeling can only be interrupted by Suppression.
